works.description:
Dear Sirs,
I am Munkhdorj Badral, an attorney-at-law in Mongol Advocate law firm,
from  
Mongolia. Our client, Ulaanbaatar Cinema LLC /www.tengis.mn/ is a  
distributor of the movies "Hotel Transylvania" (2012) and "Skyfall" (2012)
 
in Mongolia. They are exhibiting it now in their movie theater in  
Ulaanbaatar, Mongolia. i found that your users uploaded and are using the 

pirated materials, the above movies, in their blog.
Our client requested us stop the violation of their copyrights on the
blog.  
So i am requesting you to delete the material and suspend the user account
 
responsible for it. Our client confirmed us the use of the material in the
 
manner complained of is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, 

or the law. The information in the notification is accurate and i am  
authorized to act on behalf of the owner of the exclusive right holder,  
Ulaanbaatar Cinema LLC.

Yours faithfully

Munkhdorj Badral

Attorney-at-law
